text: Lindsay Wagner (b. June 22, 1949 near Los Angeles) is an Emmy Award winning television and movie actress. She is best known as the main character in the television series The Bionic Woman. She has done many other programs and movies since then. ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Emmy Award winning actors
title: Lindsay Wagner
